# SolutionMaker

A simple tool to generate a standardized Python project structure.

## Installation
```bash
cd ../solutionmaker

pip install .
```

## Usage
```bash
solutionmaker MyProject
```

## Generated Structure

```bash
MyProject/
├── bin/
│   └── settings/
│       ├── __init__.py
│       └── settings.py
├── results/
├── source/
└── main.py
```
